text:
When I process the FOP to translate a large amount of data that in XML. it 
would break and response Out of Memory Exception. I had try in java option 
like -Xms40m and -Xmx80m to do again,but still not work. Some one can tell me 
how to do it. If it is a limitation of current FOP ? Thanks for any advise 
about it..
Jackie from Taiwan 2004/07/28

creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
